abilities.name: Deranged Snotling Assault
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: More Dakka
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re‑roll a Hit roll of 1.

wargear_options: ■ This model can be equipped with 1 grot assistant.
